title: New: Wy – Bathrooms
body:
I’m such a sucker for ethereal, wistful dream-pop à la Beach House, Youth Lagoon etc.

and this latest track from Swedish outfit **Wy** definitely fits that mould. Strikingly honest songwriting merged with one of the finest vocals I’ve heard this year, _Bathrooms_ manages to feel simultaneously self-assured and resoundingly fragile. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: I’m such a sucker for ethereal, wistful dream-pop à la Beach House, Youth Lagoon etc. and this latest track from Swedish outfit Wy definitely fits that mould. Strikingly honest songwriting merged with one of the finest vocals I’ve heard this year, Bathrooms manages to feel simultaneously self-assured and resoundingly fragile. Check it out below.
